## isString() function

判断是否是字符串类型

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isString(value: any): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | any | 任意值 |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

true / false

## Example


```ts
isString('abc') // => true

```
